name: Shimmering Darkness
description:
Plays best in fullscreen mode on the browser.

You find yourself lost in a dark dungeon with seemingly no way out.  To be able to leave, you must prove yourself worthy. Use the light to traverse through the darkness.

My submission for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. This is my first-ever game jam submission. 

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys

Interact: Space bar

Torch Colours: 1234 or RGBE

Developed in Unity for Windows desktop

Made by Vipul Vikraman [Lupiv3D]

Models by Synty

Music & SFX by Leohpaz,  BGM, ellr

Keyboard sprites by beamedeighth
